name: MUTANT HUNT (itch)
description:
A game for the Old Phone Jam!

A simple game designed to look and feel like an old Nokia phone game. You're just a guy with a powerful bow, whom is given the task to destroy HUGE Mutant Creatures!

We were going to release this to HTML5, like the others, but sadly have run into so many bugs and issues... So we will be opting out and making a Windows version only. We do hope that is acceptable!

Credits:

Icon - Kellett

Music - Jonathan So

SFX - Juhani Junkala

All art, other than what was listed above, were made by Kevin O'Ryan from WakianTech. We hope you enjoy!
